Legal Opinions
External counsel must issue enforceability opinions on cross-border treatment of pledged assets.

Credit_Agreement_Conditions_Precedent.section_text:
Covenant Certification
Minimum DSCR: 1.25x
Minimum Interest Coverage Ratio (ICR): 2.10x
Max Leverage: 3.8x Net Debt / EBITDA

Portfolio Concentration Limits
Single obligor exposure may not exceed 21% of aggregate facility value.

Lease_Commitment_Agreement.section_text:
Axiom Capital V ("Lessee") agrees to lease industrial analytics infrastructure rack space from Veridian Atlas Hosting ("Lessor") for forty-eight (48) months.

Facility Description
Tier-III certified infrastructure located within Navi Mumbai DC-04.

clauses.clause_text:

Lease_Commitment_Agreement.section_text:
Base Rent
Monthly lease charge: INR 3,20,000 with annual escalation of 6%.

Indexation Clause
Rent indexed against CPI-IW. Index deviation > 5% triggers renegotiation.

Lease_Commitment_Agreement.section_text:
Operational Liability
Lessee responsible for operational misuse, unauthorized compute loads, or breach exceeding energy consumption caps.

Exit Conditions
Deinstallation notice required 45 days in advance; damage/loss settlement mandatory.
